org.transitime.monitoring

Class MonitorBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.monitoring.MonitorBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AvlFeedMonitor, DatabaseMonitoring, DatabaseQueueMonitoring, PredictabilityMonitor, SystemCpuMonitor, SystemDiskSpaceMonitor, SystemMemoryMonitor

    public abstract class MonitorBase
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for doing monitoring. If event is first triggered then an ERROR email is sent out. If not triggered anymore then an OK email is sent.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith

    • Constructor Detail

      • MonitorBase

        public MonitorBase(EmailSender emailSender,
           java.lang.String agencyId)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        emailSender - For sending out e-mails when monitor triggered or untriggered
        agencyId - Identifies agency

    • Method Detail

      • checkAndNotify

        public boolean checkAndNotify()
        Checks the monitor object to see if state has changed currently triggered. If state changes then sends out notification e-mail.
        Returns:
        True if monitor currently triggered

      • getMessage

        public java.lang.String getMessage()
        Returns any message from the last time monitoring was checked.
        Returns:
        Message describing situation. Should be set whether or not monitor is currently triggered so can also provide an OK message.

      • recipientsGlobal

        public static java.lang.String recipientsGlobal()
        Returns comma separated list of who should be notified via e-mail when trigger state changes for the monitor. Specified by the Java property transitime.monitoring.emailRecipients . A static class so cannot be overwritten.
        Returns:
        E-mail addresses of who to notify
